boardgame.name: Atlantic Star
boardgame.description: This is a remake of db Spiele's Premiere and Queen Games' Show Manager. The theme has been changed to cruising: here the players are travelling by sea. The mechanics are otherwise almost identical._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

New in Shrink. Shipping costs will be true, and based on your chosen options and speed. I ship via USPS. Your options are Parcel Post or Priority and any other extras you would like such as Insurance or Delivery Confirmation. I pride myself on a fast turnaround time, and am almost always able to get orders out within 1 business day of receiving payment.

This copy was opened and played once. As expected, all of the components are in very good shape as a result. The box is also good, but has one ding on a corner that happened in transit as well as a slight dent in one of the edges on the top. These are nothing major, but I list them here in the interest of full disclosure... Shipping will be true cost, and will include your chosen extras (insurance, delivery confirmation). I generally ship games Priority mail because the difference in cost between that and Parcel post tends to be negligible, but it is up to you. I happily combine shipping if you order multiple games at once. I accept Paypal, Cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Checks, Money Orders, and Cash. I pride myself on a fast turnaround time, in all but the strangest of circumstances I will get your order shipped within 1 business day of receiving payment.

I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m offering the original German edition by Queen games. The game is new + sealed !! Shipping is EUR 9 within Europe or $16 worldwide, both surface mail, no insurance, no track+trace. The delivery time is between 9-12 weeks. We have many other interesting and rare games! Email us! We can collect games up to 5 - 10 or 20 kg boxes, so you can save shipping costs! Just email for more information! Shipping is with insurance + track+trace then and only takes about 1-2 weeks!!

original german Queen Games edition (2001) new and shrinkwrapped in perfect condition

Atlantic Star (2001) from Queen Games Box: Light shelf-wear but some heavy damage to one corner. The corners of the top and bottom have been repaired with clear tape. Despite the damage, the box closes cleanly and does it job perfectly. Overall the box is in good+ condition. Contents: I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not sure if there were other rule books in this version, but now there is just the English rules (and English player aids). There is a small pen amrk on the front of the rules, but except for this tiny thing, the rest of the components are in like new condition! SHIPPING U.S. shipping will be via USPS Priority Shipping and based on a weight of 3 Lbs. International buyers are very welcome, but please contact me for a shipping price quote to avoid any surprises or misunderstandings. I will gladly combine shipping for multiple purchases. The final cost will be based on the total weight, but be aware that large packages that are shipped more than a certain distance accrue a large surcharge, so combining shipping may not save any money.

This is a complete copy of the German edition of Atlantic Star. Even though it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the German edition, the tiles are in both German and English. The rulebook is in German, but I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll include a translation (the same one you can print out from here on BoardGameGeek). The text on the player cards is mostly unimportant, but you can print those out in English from a BoardGameGeek file, too. The game has not been played, and is in excellent condition. The box bottom shows light wear on its edges, and the box top shows very light use, as well. The cards, boards, and tiles are all flawless, as is the crayon. The rulebook is in very good condition, but is (as mentioned above) in German. Shipping for this game is $10.20 within the US (for fixed rate priority mail). Note that I do reduce shipping charges if you buy more than one of my games -- Send me a message and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll calculate the discount. (I charge an estimate of the actual shipping cost.)
